div.head: TO THE READER AND ALL WORTHY ADuenturers by Sea, and well wishers to NAVIGATION.
div.p: IF my desire to doe good hath transported mee beyond my selfe, I intreat you excuse me, and take for requitall this rude bundle of many ages obseruations; although they be not so punctually compiled as I could wish, and it may bee you expect; At this present I cannot much amend them; if any will bestow that paines, I shall thinke him my friend, and honour his endeuours. In the interim accept them as they are, and ponder errours in the balance of good will,
